txt.en: Discovery: Ghashan-kútot - the Hall of Black Lore

This was once the great lore-hall of Minas Ithil, the store-house of Númenórean knowledge and learning prized by Queen Valardis, but no longer. Now it is Ghashan-kútot, the Hall of Black Lore, and someone... or something... stalks among its shelves, seeking to acquire the dark knowledge of all things.
You have discovered the entrance to Ghashan-kútot - the Hall of Black Lore.
